tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    message_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    is_read BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  message_text TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES instructors(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES instructors(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Messages (
 message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 sender_id INT,
 receiver_id INT,
 message_text TEXT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Message (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT NOT NULL,
  receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
  message_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
